title: Allbirds prices IPO at $15 a share, valuing company at $2.15 billion
text:
Read:Allbirds IPO: 5 things to know about the eco-friendly shoe company before it goes public

The company, best known for its eco-friendly shoes and sneakers, expects to start trading Wednesday on the Nasdaq under the ticker “BIRD.”

Morgan Stanley, JPMorgan and BofA Securities are acting as lead book-running managers.
